TopicTitle: rocket being pulled by an unknown force

Articles.Content: Trying to ship a large fuel canister into lko, ship works fine but every 10-30 seconds it will randomly pull aggressively towards the center of the blue side of the navball (regardless of position, altitude or angle). It's not impossible to correct over and over but its just a drain on my resources and altogether a pain so I was hoping somebody on here might know something.
Welcome to the forum @Yasone, your problem has been moved from KSP 2 Discussion to KSP 2 Bug Reports.
